# Apparition (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Phantasm Spells|phantasm]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** Maho 2, [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]], [[2nd Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a miniature palette dotted with paints of assorted colors)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC), pg. 97

This spell causes the subject’s face to take on a horrible and terrifying appearance. You can create nearly any combination of hideous features—blue skin, parrot face, elephantine nose, rotting tusks, or worse—but you cannot duplicate the appearance of any specifi c creature or person. Any creature (excluding you and your allies) that views the recipient and fails its save becomes [[Shaken|shaken]].

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Maho 2 to Level per Oriental Adventures. Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level.
